review_title: great people, challenging leadership at the time
pros: great people, great programming, fair salary
cons: leadership has since changed but tensions existed between artistic and business leadership at the time

pros: Get to work with great global artists on a pretty renowned festival.
cons: Executive team needs work, very adverse to change and growth. Certain directors hired into roles with not enough experience which makes it an incredibly difficult environment.

pros: A great culture, great access to art, busy/bustling festival.
cons: Not the best work/life balance, sometimes pressure in the workforce
